This isn't true 1080p, the definition is of a lower quality than 1080p. I have a few true 1080p movies and they are around 8gb a piece and they look glorious, you can count the actors pores on their faces. It's watchable but it isn't high-def like stated. I have downloaded several of this YIFY's movies, and they are all poor quality. I will never download another one of his movies again. If you want true HD movies, exclude any of these YIFY rips from your choices because they look terrible, on every one I have downloaded I can see pixels and the resolution is only slightly better than an SD DVD rip.
